DJ DIGITAL
First Thursdays
DJ Digital
Raised on Long Island, NY, Digital started DJing like most kids do growing up in the suburbs by playing at parties for friends. While developing his skill and knowledge for music he got a job at a special events production company. That opened doors for Anthony to perform at events such as 50 Cent’s Vitamin Water Tour, Swizz Beats’ Wedding, and the opening act for many touring musical artists. Anthony’s DJing resume dates back to 2001 where he brings his knowledge of all genres of music with him. Anthony is categorized as an Open Format DJ, bringing Hip-Hop, Rock, Reggae, Freestyle, and more to the ears of people dancing. With major influences coming from Mash-up Kings DJ Riz and Sizzahandz, the late DJ AM, the Magnificent Jazzy Jeff to name a few, and growing up in the New York club scene, Anthony has developed into a premier party DJ having been requested to do over hundreds of parties, weddings, and special events not including regular resident nights at clubs.
February 6th, 2025
DJ Digital spins the hottest beats at Proper Orlando this First Thursdays, February 6th, from 9pm-2am. Expect an electrifying night of music, expertly crafted cocktails, and a sophisticated atmosphere.
Details

Industry Night & DJ Speaker Giveaway
April 22nd, 2025
The prize will be a PAIR of brand new Pioneer XPR82 powered professional speakers! Every paid customer will receive raffle tickets.
Details
* Only 100 Tickets will be sold *
tICKETS
Get Tickets
*
Capacity Stricly Limited
*
*
Only 100 Tickets will be sold
*
Share This Event
Days
Hours
Minutes
Seconds
Tuesday, April 22nd
Industry Night & DJ Speaker Giveaway at Proper
Get ready for an electrifying Industry Night presented by
Hi-Fi Social Club
at Proper Orlando on Tuesday, April 15th, 2025! This isn’t just another night out; it’s your chance to network, discover fresh talent, and potentially walk away with a serious upgrade to your sound system.
Every paid customer through the door will receive raffle tickets
for a shot at winning a
BRAND NEW PAIR of Pioneer XPR82 powered professional speakers
– a prize any serious DJ or music enthusiast will covet! The more you groove with us early, the better your odds!
Arrive between:
9 PM and 10 PM
for
5 raffle tickets
Arrive between:
10 PM and 11 PM
for
4 raffle tickets
Arrive between:
11 PM and 12 AM
for
3 raffle tickets
Arrive between:
12 AM and 12:30 AM
FOR
1 raffle ticket
The grand prize drawing will take place between 12:45 AM and 1 AM – don’t miss your chance!
Adding to the excitement, Industry Night will also feature “15 Minutes of Fame,” an Artist Discovery program by HTG Events. This fantastic initiative aims to spotlight and nurture local artistic talent, offering up to 20 DJs the opportunity to showcase their skills and gain valuable exposure. If you’re a local DJ looking for your moment to shine, head over to the Hi-Fi Social Club’s Facebook page and find the Google Docs link to sign up! Don’t miss this incredible opportunity to play your music for a vibrant industry crowd. Remember, you must be 21+ to enter this can’t-miss event. Come early, support local artists, and maybe even leave with a top-of-the-line sound system courtesy of Hi-Fi Social Club and HTG Events!
Share This Event
Days
Hours
Minutes
Seconds
Tuesday, April 22nd
Industry Night & DJ Speaker Giveaway at Proper
Make Reservations
The Giveaway: BRAND NEW PAIR of Pioneer XPR82 Powered Professional Speakers
The Pioneer XPR82 is a powerful, high-performance 12-inch powered loudspeaker designed for professional sound reinforcement. Delivering impactful audio with its efficient Class-D amplification and robust build, it offers a peak power output of 1000 Watts. Ideal for DJs, live performers, and event spaces, the XPR82 ensures clear, punchy sound and reliable performance night after night. Winning a pair means instantly upgrading your audio setup with industry-standard quality.
Get Tickets

Tuesday, April 15th
Kasia at Proper
Get ready for a sonic journey with
DJ Kasia
! Originally hailing from Poland and now a fixture in London’s underground scene since 2001, Kasia began her professional DJing career in 2009. Expect an eclectic and captivating set, seamlessly weaving through the realms of house, dub, and techno, all underpinned by deep, irresistible grooves and a touch of funk. Having graced the decks in cities across Europe, including Berlin and Amsterdam, Kasia brings a wealth of experience and a passion for authentic electronic sounds that will keep you moving all night long.

Hours

Tuesday, April 8th
Sam Collins at Proper
Sam Collins
is not your average DJ; he’s a visionary artist redefining electronic music. As a talented producer, his tracks on SoundCloud and Spotify have amassed millions of streams, making him a trendsetter in the industry. What sets Sam apart is his dual role as both a DJ and producer. He understands that being a great producer is fundamental to being an exceptional DJ.
Sam Collins is poised to reshape the electronic music landscape, captivating global audiences and pushing creative boundaries. His own productions show huge success mirrored by over 350,000 monthly Spotify listeners and DJ support all over the globe by the likes of David Guetta, Tiesto, Don Diablo, Gordo, Tchami, Maala, Oliver Heldens, Martin Garrix, and many more!
Hi-Fi Social Club is a brand new concept by HTGs’ Founder Jeff Kenney and I love Florida House’s Kyle Myers. The core mission statement of Hi-Fi Social Club is to provide the best audio experience possible with great service and awesome performers.
This events capacity will be strictly limited!

Days
Hours

Tuesday, April 29th
James Zabiela at Proper
James Zabiela
, born on August 7, 1979, in Southampton, England, is a highly respected DJ and producer in the electronic music scene. He initially gained recognition in 2000 by winning Muzik Magazine’s “Bedroom Bedlam” competition. This victory propelled him into the professional realm, leading to a signing with Sasha’s Excession DJ agency.
Zabiela’s early signature sound was a blend of breakbeat and progressive house. Over time, his style has evolved to encompass progressive house, techno, and acid house, though elements of breakbeat often remain integral to his sets. He is celebrated for his exceptional turntable skills, creative use of loops and effects, and his mastery of Pioneer CDJ equipment, often incorporating Ableton Live and various controllers, including occasionally an iPad, into his performances.
His technical prowess has earned him accolades as a “technical Jedi,” consistently pushing the boundaries of DJing. This expertise has even led to a long-standing relationship with Pioneer, where he provides feedback on their new DJ hardware.
Throughout his career, Zabiela has released numerous mix albums and original tracks on esteemed labels such as Renaissance and his own imprint, Born Electric, established in 2012. Born Electric has showcased music from a diverse range of artists.
James Zabiela’s dynamic and technically intricate DJ sets have captivated audiences worldwide, establishing him as a prominent figure in electronic music.

Timeless Brunch
Sundays
Proper, Orlando’s premier destination for an unparalleled cocktail and vinyl experience, is thrilled to announce its new weekly event: Timeless Brunch Sundays. This isn’t just brunch; it’s a meticulously crafted “grown and fun” party designed for those who appreciate exceptional drinks, delicious food, and a vibrant atmosphere, all while ensuring you’re home at a reasonable hour.
Details
Every Sunday at Proper.
Share This Event
Sundays at Proper Orlando
MC Serch & Walgee
Timeless Brunch Sundays at Proper offers the ideal balance: a lively party atmosphere that wraps up early, ensuring you’re back home by 8 PM, refreshed and ready for the week ahead. There’s no cover charge to experience this unique event, making it an accessible and enticing option for your Sunday plans. Please note that this is a 21+ event, and identification is a must.
Join Proper every Sunday for Timeless Brunch and bring your energy—we’ll provide the rest!
Share This Event
